bibl.title: Two New Arabic Editions: A Land Survey from Ihnās and Ḥadīths Concerning Funerary Practice.
Documents and the History of the Early Islamic World

bibl.note: 1. P. Haun. Inv. Arab. 21; 22. Report of a Surveyor. Ihnās, 383 AH (26 Feb. 993 - 17 Jan. 994 C.E.). - 2. P. A.C.P.S.I. [Ain Shams University, Center for Papyrological Studies and Inscriptions] Inv. 126. Instructions Concerning Funerals. Provenance unknown, ca. 2nd / 8th century.
bibl.seg: 141.8 P. Ain Shams Univ. Inv. 126 P. Haun. Arab. Inv. 21; 22
Alia Hanafi, Two New Arabic Editions: A Land Survey from Ihnās and Ḥadīths Concerning Funerary Practice.

Alexander T. Schubert & Petra M. Sijpesteijn (edd.), Documents and the History of the Early Islamic World = Islamic History and Civilization. Studies and Texts. 111 (Leiden - Boston, 2014) pp. 261-290, 6 pll. coul.

1. P. Haun. Inv. Arab. 21; 22. Report of a Surveyor. Ihnās, 383 AH (26 Feb. 993 - 17 Jan. 994 C.E.). - 2. P. A.C.P.S.I. [Ain Shams University, Center for Papyrological Studies and Inscriptions] Inv. 126. Instructions Concerning Funerals. Provenance unknown, ca. 2nd / 8th century.
